web_form_fields.label: We would like to know your views on Education
Why is Shishuvan a choice for your child ?
According to you, what is an ideal partnership between the school and parents, in the education of the child ?
How would you like to help the school as parents ?
Mother's age at the time of birth
Fathers's age at the time of birth
Your child is the Eldest / Middle / Youngest
Any complications or medication taken during the pregnancy
Child's health at birth (describe any health problems.)
if yes please describe the reasons
Did the child cry immediately after birth (Birth cry)
Describe childs general behaviour during the neonatal period (first four weeks)
When did your child have his/her first paediatric visit ? Name & address of the paediatrician/family doctor.
How frequent are the doctors visits now
Tick if the child has any of the following illness
Has the child been through the required immunizations
Has your child ever been hospitalized after birth till now ? Describe the circumstance.
Does your child have any chronic or debilitating illness
Is your child currently under any kind of medication
Does your child have any allergies
Does your child have any disablities
Milestones - Leave blank if not achieved. Mention Age if achieved.
Could feed self with or without a soppn
Recognized the names of familiar people object and body parts
Repeated words spoken to him / her
Shared his / her toys with others
Do you as a parent have any concerns about your child
Family Details - Have any of the following situations mentioned below occurred in your household
Transition from Joint Family to Nuclear Family or Vice Versa
Move to new City or Home
Exposure of Chronic arguments or fights
Any description of any of the above and when
Currently does your child exhibit any of the following behavioural / emotional attributes ?
Number of hours your child watches TV everyday
With which Adult does your child spend most of the time

web_form_fields.label: Does your child have opportunities to play with other children
What kind of physical activity does your child indulge in

web_form_fields.description: Shishuvan believes that one aim of education is to be a good human being. What else do you consider to be desirable objectives for a good school ?
web_form_fields.label: Question 1

web_form_fields.description: You are aware that Shishuvan's structure is non-competitive (no exams until class 7, no ranking, no comparison of students). After passing out from such a school how do you see your child meeting the challenges of today's highly competitive driven world ?
web_form_fields.label: Question 2

web_form_fields.description: Some children take time to settle in the school. We would like the first experience of the school to be gentle and comfortable for him/her. If your child takes time to settle in, would you or a family member be able to spend time in the school with him/her as long as it takes(if no, please explain why, giving reasons.)
web_form_fields.label: Question 3

web_form_fields.description: When applications exceed the number of seats available, what criteria should the school apply for selection that are considered just and fair by all ?
web_form_fields.label: Question 4
